original_text: I realized that God had not sent him, but that he had prophesied against me because Tobiah and Sanballat had hired him.
korean_text: 깨달은즉 그는 하나님께서 보내신 바가 아니라 도비야와 산발랏에게 뇌물을 받고 내게 이런 예언을 함이라

sentences.original_text: that God had not sent him
but that he had prophesied against me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 나를 대적하여 예언했었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: because Tobiah and Sanballat had hired him
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 도비야와 산발랏이 그를 고용했기 때문입니다
